  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Fills all the text fields and combo boxes based on the customer that was selected from the Customers page.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url -
      resourceBundle -

    • onSelectCountry

      public void onSelectCountry()
      Fills the division combo box with a list of divisions based on the selected country. If no country is selected the method returns without filling the division combo box.

    • onSaveReturnBtn

      public void onSaveReturnBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws Exception
      Changes a customer in the Customers table of the database based on the customer selected to modify and the data entered by the user. Once the customer has been modified in the database, this method navigates to the Customers page.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Clicking the save button.
      Throws:
      Exception - In case of a sql, input, or output exception.

    • onCancelBtn

      public void onCancelBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Navigates to the Customers page.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Clicking the cancel button.
      Throws:
      IOException - In case of input or output exception.
